name: 2025 9th International Conference on Education and Distance Learning
content: Publication: Option 1: Publication in IJIET (ISSN: 2010-3689). Submissions related to information technology will be reviewed by both conference committess and IJIET editorial board, accepted papers will be published into regular issues of IJIET. The journal is now indexed by Scopus, Inspec, Electronic Journals Library, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc Option 2: Publication in IJLT (ISSN: 2377-2891(Print); 2377-2905(Online)). Submissions not related to information technology will be reviewed by both conference committess and IJLT editorial board, accepted papers will be published into regular issues of IJLT. which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Crossref, etc.
